title: Vegetarian Lentil Soup
ingredients: ['300g green or brown lentils', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 medium onions, chopped', '3 garlic cloves, finely chopped', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '3 tablespoons tomato puree', '1 small celery, chopped', '1/2 carrot, chopped', '2 bay leaves', '1 bunch chopped parsley', '1 tablespoon Dijon mustard', '1-2 tablespoons red wine vinegar']
